name: countrified
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A countrified person or thing belongs to or is suited to the countryside: I thought of myself as sophisticated compared with my countrified relatives.disapproving The hotel's decor was tasteless and countrified (= artificially like something seen in the countryside). Synonym

rural
